# ion-ripple-effect

The ripple effect component adds the [Material Design ink ripple interaction effect](https://material.io/develop/web/components/ripples/). This component can be used without a button and can be added to any component.


<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute   | Description                                                            | Type                   |
| ---------- | ----------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------- |
| `parent`   | `parent`    |                                                                        | `HTMLElement | string` |
| `tapClick` | `tap-click` | If true, the ripple effect will listen to any click events and animate | `boolean`              |


## Methods

| Method      | Description                                  |
| ----------- | -------------------------------------------- |
| `addRipple` | Adds the ripple effect to the parent element |


----------------------------------------------

*Built with [StencilJS](https://stenciljs.com/)*
